title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Build production AI agents with the Strands Agents SDK for TypeScript (AIM3331)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Strands Agents SDK for TypeScript 构建生产级 AI 代理 (AIM3331)
abstract: Discover how to build enterprise-ready AI agents using the newly launched Strands Agents SDK for TypeScript. This session introduces developers to a simple model-driven framework for building agents that run on any cloud, support multiple LLM providers, and integrate with the tools you already have. Learn how TypeScript developers can now leverage the same production-ready agent framework that Python teams have been using, with full type safety and seamless integration into modern JavaScript ecosystems. We'll cover key features, demonstrate multi-agent patterns, and explore deployment options from Amazon EKS to Amazon Bedrock AgentCore with live coding examples.
abstract_cn: 了解如何使用新推出的 Strands Agents SDK for TypeScript 构建企业级 AI 代理。本次会议向开发者介绍一个简单的模型驱动框架，用于构建可在任何云上运行、支持多个 LLM 提供商并与您现有工具集成的代理。了解 TypeScript 开发者现在如何利用 Python 团队一直在使用的同一个生产就绪代理框架，具备完整的类型安全性和与现代 JavaScript 生态系统的无缝集成。我们将涵盖关键功能，演示多代理模式，并通过实时编码示例探索从 Amazon EKS 到 Amazon Bedrock AgentCore 的部署选项。
